column1: '''A Daughter of Kings''' is the eighteenth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the twenty-sixth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
